title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Design Workshop for Improving Satisfaction in Online IT Certification Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental IT skills and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, focusing on asynchronous collaboration rather than real-time interaction.

learning_goals: Through problem-based group activities, learners can identify and explain at least three factors influencing online education satisfaction
Learners can design and implement learner-learner and learner-instructor interaction strategies in mobile environments
Learners can propose at least two microlearning content structures that ensure flexibility in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
